title: Substitute
text: Substitute $$x+2$$ into g(x). Do this by replacing every $$x$$ in the function with $$x+2$$.
speech: Substitute  x plus, 2  into g(x). Do this by replacing every  x  in the function with  x, plus 2 .

title: Simplify
text: Simplify the equation as much as possible.
